General.Name: Volcano Bhd
General.Description: Volcano Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures parts and components used in electrical and electronics, and automotive industries in Southeast Asia region. The company manufactures and sells metal and non-metal nameplates; plastic injection molded parts; overlays; acrylic sheets; and die cut parts, as well as offers value added assembly and other services. It serves multinational customers across various industries, such as electrical and electronic, automotive, food, furniture, aerospace, and label industries. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Perai, Malaysia.
